# uptimekuma_notification_gtxmessaging (Resource)

GTX Messaging notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Basic GTX Messaging SMS notification
resource "uptimekuma_notification_gtxmessaging" "example" {
  name      = "GTX Messaging Alerts"
  api_key   = "your-gtx-messaging-api-key"
  from      = "UptimeKuma"
  to        = "+1234567890"
  is_active = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) GTX Messaging API key
- `from` (String) Sender ID
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `to` (String) Recipient phone number

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
